with open('../input/tokyo-olympics21-medalscsv/medals.csv') as csvfile:
    read_csv = csv.reader(csvfile, delimiter=',')
    header = next(read_csv)
    rank, team, gold, silver, bronze, total, tot_rank = [], [], [], [], [], [], []
    for row in read_csv:
        rank.append(int(row[0]))
        team.append(row[1])
        gold.append(int(row[2]))
        silver.append(int(row[3]))
        bronze.append(int(row[4]))
        total.append(int(row[5]))
        tot_rank.append(int(row[6]))

plt.figure(figsize=(12,12))
X, Y = [], []
for g, t in list(zip(gold, team)):
    if g >= 10:
        X.append(g)
        Y.append(t)

plt.pie(X, labels = Y, startangle=90)
plt.title('Tokyo Olympics 2021 - Teams with golds >= 10')
plt.legend(X)
plt.show()
